class.name: FontFile
class.brief_description: Holds font source data and prerendered glyph cache, imported from a dynamic or a bitmap font.
class.description: [FontFile] contains a set of glyphs to represent Unicode characters imported from a font file, as well as a cache of rasterized glyphs, and a set of fallback [Font]s to use. Use [FontVariation] to access specific OpenType variation of the font, create simulated bold / slanted version, and draw lines of text. For more complex text processing, use [FontVariation] in conjunction with [TextLine] or [TextParagraph]. Supported font formats: - Dynamic font importer: TrueType (.ttf), TrueType collection (.ttc), OpenType (.otf), OpenType collection (.otc), WOFF (.woff), WOFF2 (.woff2), Type 1 (.pfb, .pfm). - Bitmap font importer: AngelCode BMFont (.fnt, .font), text and binary (version 3) format variants. - Monospace image font importer: All supported image formats. [b]Note:[/b] A character is a symbol that represents an item (letter, digit etc.) in an abstract way. [b]Note:[/b] A glyph is a bitmap or a shape used to draw one or more characters in a context-dependent manner. Glyph indices are bound to the specific font data source. [b]Note:[/b] If none of the font data sources contain glyphs for a character used in a string, the character in question will be replaced with a box displaying its hexadecimal code. [codeblocks] [gdscript] var f = load("res://BarlowCondensed-Bold.ttf") $Label.add_theme_font_override("font", f) $Label.add_theme_font_size_override("font_size", 64) [/gdscript] [csharp] var f = ResourceLoader.Load<FontFile>("res://BarlowCondensed-Bold.ttf"); GetNode("Label").AddThemeFontOverride("font", f); GetNode("Label").AddThemeFontSizeOverride("font_size", 64); [/csharp] [/codeblocks]

method.name: clear_cache
method.description: Removes all font cache entries.

method.name: clear_glyphs
method.description: Removes all rendered glyph information from the cache entry. [b]Note:[/b] This function will not remove textures associated with the glyphs, use [method remove_texture] to remove them manually.

method.name: clear_kerning_map
method.description: Removes all kerning overrides.

method.name: clear_size_cache
method.description: Removes all font sizes from the cache entry.

method.name: clear_textures
method.description: Removes all textures from font cache entry. [b]Note:[/b] This function will not remove glyphs associated with the texture, use [method remove_glyph] to remove them manually.

method.name: get_cache_ascent
method.description: Returns the font ascent (number of pixels above the baseline).

method.name: get_cache_count
method.description: Returns number of the font cache entries.

method.name: get_cache_descent
method.description: Returns the font descent (number of pixels below the baseline).

method.name: get_cache_scale
method.description: Returns scaling factor of the color bitmap font.

method.name: get_cache_underline_position
method.description: Returns pixel offset of the underline below the baseline.

method.name: get_cache_underline_thickness
method.description: Returns thickness of the underline in pixels.

method.name: get_char_from_glyph_index
method.description: Returns character code associated with [param glyph_index], or [code]0[/code] if [param glyph_index] is invalid. See [method get_glyph_index].

method.name: get_embolden
method.description: Returns embolden strength, if is not equal to zero, emboldens the font outlines. Negative values reduce the outline thickness.

method.name: get_extra_baseline_offset
method.description: Returns extra baseline offset (as a fraction of font height).

method.name: get_extra_spacing
method.description: Returns spacing for [param spacing] (see [enum TextServer.SpacingType]) in pixels (not relative to the font size).

method.name: get_face_index
method.description: Returns an active face index in the TrueType / OpenType collection.

method.name: get_glyph_advance
method.description: Returns glyph advance (offset of the next glyph). [b]Note:[/b] Advance for glyphs outlines is the same as the base glyph advance and is not saved.

method.name: get_glyph_index
method.description: Returns the glyph index of a [param char], optionally modified by the [param variation_selector].

method.name: get_glyph_list
method.description: Returns list of rendered glyphs in the cache entry.

method.name: get_glyph_offset
method.description: Returns glyph offset from the baseline.

method.name: get_glyph_size
method.description: Returns glyph size.

method.name: get_glyph_texture_idx
method.description: Returns index of the cache texture containing the glyph.

method.name: get_glyph_uv_rect
method.description: Returns rectangle in the cache texture containing the glyph.

method.name: get_kerning
method.description: Returns kerning for the pair of glyphs.

method.name: get_kerning_list
method.description: Returns list of the kerning overrides.

method.name: get_language_support_override
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if support override is enabled for the [param language].

method.name: get_language_support_overrides
method.description: Returns list of language support overrides.

method.name: get_script_support_override
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if support override is enabled for the [param script].

method.name: get_script_support_overrides
method.description: Returns list of script support overrides.

method.name: get_size_cache_list
method.description: Returns list of the font sizes in the cache. Each size is [Vector2i] with font size and outline size.

method.name: get_texture_count
method.description: Returns number of textures used by font cache entry.

method.name: get_texture_image
method.description: Returns a copy of the font cache texture image.

method.name: get_texture_offsets
method.description: Returns a copy of the array containing glyph packing data.

method.name: get_transform
method.description: Returns 2D transform, applied to the font outlines, can be used for slanting, flipping and rotating glyphs.

method.name: get_variation_coordinates
method.description: Returns variation coordinates for the specified font cache entry. See [method Font.get_supported_variation_list] for more info.

method.name: load_bitmap_font
method.description: Loads an AngelCode BMFont (.fnt, .font) bitmap font from file [param path]. [b]Warning:[/b] This method should only be used in the editor or in cases when you need to load external fonts at run-time, such as fonts located at the [code]user://[/code] directory.

method.name: load_dynamic_font
method.description: Loads a TrueType (.ttf), OpenType (.otf), WOFF (.woff), WOFF2 (.woff2) or Type 1 (.pfb, .pfm) dynamic font from file [param path]. [b]Warning:[/b] This method should only be used in the editor or in cases when you need to load external fonts at run-time, such as fonts located at the [code]user://[/code] directory.

method.name: remove_cache
method.description: Removes specified font cache entry.

method.name: remove_glyph
method.description: Removes specified rendered glyph information from the cache entry. [b]Note:[/b] This function will not remove textures associated with the glyphs, use [method remove_texture] to remove them manually.

method.name: remove_kerning
method.description: Removes kerning override for the pair of glyphs.

method.name: remove_language_support_override
method.description: Remove language support override.

method.name: remove_script_support_override
method.description: Removes script support override.

method.name: remove_size_cache
method.description: Removes specified font size from the cache entry.

method.name: remove_texture
method.description: Removes specified texture from the cache entry. [b]Note:[/b] This function will not remove glyphs associated with the texture. Remove them manually using [method remove_glyph].

method.name: render_glyph
method.description: Renders specified glyph to the font cache texture.

method.name: render_range
method.description: Renders the range of characters to the font cache texture.

method.name: set_cache_ascent
method.description: Sets the font ascent (number of pixels above the baseline).

method.name: set_cache_descent
method.description: Sets the font descent (number of pixels below the baseline).

method.name: set_cache_scale
method.description: Sets scaling factor of the color bitmap font.

method.name: set_cache_underline_position
method.description: Sets pixel offset of the underline below the baseline.

method.name: set_cache_underline_thickness
method.description: Sets thickness of the underline in pixels.

method.name: set_embolden
method.description: Sets embolden strength, if is not equal to zero, emboldens the font outlines. Negative values reduce the outline thickness.

method.name: set_extra_baseline_offset
method.description: Sets extra baseline offset (as a fraction of font height).

method.name: set_extra_spacing
method.description: Sets the spacing for [param spacing] (see [enum TextServer.SpacingType]) to [param value] in pixels (not relative to the font size).

method.name: set_face_index
method.description: Sets an active face index in the TrueType / OpenType collection.

method.name: set_glyph_advance
method.description: Sets glyph advance (offset of the next glyph). [b]Note:[/b] Advance for glyphs outlines is the same as the base glyph advance and is not saved.

method.name: set_glyph_offset
method.description: Sets glyph offset from the baseline.

method.name: set_glyph_size
method.description: Sets glyph size.

method.name: set_glyph_texture_idx
method.description: Sets index of the cache texture containing the glyph.

method.name: set_glyph_uv_rect
method.description: Sets rectangle in the cache texture containing the glyph.

method.name: set_kerning
method.description: Sets kerning for the pair of glyphs.

method.name: set_language_support_override
method.description: Adds override for [method Font.is_language_supported].

method.name: set_script_support_override
method.description: Adds override for [method Font.is_script_supported].

method.name: set_texture_image
method.description: Sets font cache texture image.

method.name: set_texture_offsets
method.description: Sets array containing glyph packing data.

method.name: set_transform
method.description: Sets 2D transform, applied to the font outlines, can be used for slanting, flipping, and rotating glyphs.

method.name: set_variation_coordinates
method.description: Sets variation coordinates for the specified font cache entry. See [method Font.get_supported_variation_list] for more info.

members.member: If set to [code]true[/code], system fonts can be automatically used as fallbacks.
Font anti-aliasing mode.
Contents of the dynamic font source file.
If set to [code]true[/code], embedded font bitmap loading is disabled (bitmap-only and color fonts ignore this property).
Font size, used only for the bitmap fonts.
Scaling mode, used only for the bitmap fonts with [member fixed_size] greater than zero.
Font family name.
Font stretch amount, compared to a normal width. A percentage value between [code]50%[/code] and [code]200%[/code].
Font style flags, see [enum TextServer.FontStyle].
Weight (boldness) of the font. A value in the [code]100...999[/code] range, normal font weight is [code]400[/code], bold font weight is [code]700[/code].
If set to [code]true[/code], auto-hinting is supported and preferred over font built-in hinting. Used by dynamic fonts only (MSDF fonts don't support hinting).
If set to [code]true[/code], generate mipmaps for the font textures.
Font hinting mode. Used by dynamic fonts only.

If set to [code]true[/code], when aligning glyphs to the pixel boundaries rounding remainders are accumulated to ensure more uniform glyph distribution. This setting has no effect if subpixel positioning is enabled.
LCD subpixel layout used for font anti-aliasing. See [enum TextServer.FontLCDSubpixelLayout].

The width of the range around the shape between the minimum and maximum representable signed distance. If using font outlines, [member msdf_pixel_range] must be set to at least [i]twice[/i] the size of the largest font outline. The default [member msdf_pixel_range] value of [code]16[/code] allows outline sizes up to [code]8[/code] to look correct.

Source font size used to generate MSDF textures. Higher values allow for more precision, but are slower to render and require more memory. Only increase this value if you notice a visible lack of precision in glyph rendering.

If set to [code]true[/code], glyphs of all sizes are rendered using single multichannel signed distance field (MSDF) generated from the dynamic font vector data. Since this approach does not rely on rasterizing the font every time its size changes, this allows for resizing the font in real-time without any performance penalty. Text will also not look grainy for [Control]s that are scaled down (or for [Label3D]s viewed from a long distance). As a downside, font hinting is not available with MSDF. The lack of font hinting may result in less crisp and less readable fonts at small sizes. [b]Note:[/b] If using font outlines, [member msdf_pixel_range] must be set to at least [i]twice[/i] the size of the largest font outline. [b]Note:[/b] MSDF font rendering does not render glyphs with overlapping shapes correctly. Overlapping shapes are not valid per the OpenType standard, but are still commonly found in many font files, especially those converted by Google Fonts. To avoid issues with overlapping glyphs, consider downloading the font file directly from the type foundry instead of relying on Google Fonts.
Font OpenType feature set override.
Font oversampling factor. If set to [code]0.0[/code], the global oversampling factor is used instead. Used by dynamic fonts only (MSDF fonts ignore oversampling).
Font style name.

Font glyph subpixel positioning mode. Subpixel positioning provides shaper text and better kerning for smaller font sizes, at the cost of higher memory usage and lower font rasterization speed. Use [constant TextServer.SUBPIXEL_POSITIONING_AUTO] to automatically enable it based on the font size.
